_purpose: Competition video analysis — optimized for concept generation, not academic research. Every field feeds directly into Next.BLR concept creation.

content_identity.content_archetype: Shock | Math | Drama | Authority | Contrarian | Emotional | Status | POV | Educational | Hybrid

entry_arrest._analysis_window: 0-3 seconds — the only part that matters for 86.9% non-followers
entry_arrest.camera_movement: Static | Zoom-in | Fast push | Handheld | Jump cut | Pattern break
entry_arrest.pattern_interrupt_type: Visual shock | Audio spike | Movement | Text contradiction | Facial expression | Environmental change

visual_disruption._guide: 0-10. How much does frame 1 violate feed expectation? Anomaly, scale, risk, proximity.

feed_contrast._guide: 0-10. Would this POP between a cat video and a meme? Brightness, color, angle.

motion_intensity._guide: 0-10. Kinetic pull in first 1.5 sec. Speed, direction, unpredictability.

cognitive_tension._guide: 0-10. Unresolved visual question. Incomplete action, suspended event, ambiguity.

entry_arrest.dominant_hook_type: Shock entry (VD dominant) | Pattern interrupt (FC dominant) | Kinetic entry (MI dominant) | Suspense entry (CT dominant) | Hybrid
entry_arrest.maps_to_our_hook_taxonomy: Absurdist Comedy | Cultural Reference | Family Emotion | PAS | Price Shock | Cash/Money Visual | CCTV | Controversy + Proof | Before/After | Testimonial | Feature Demo

retention_mechanics._analysis_window: 3 seconds to end — why people STAY
retention_mechanics.story_shape: Ascending Staircase | J-Curve | PAS Comedy Pivot | Dual-Peak | Ramp-Up + Plateau | U-Curve | Front-Loaded Spike
_retention_device_options: Curiosity stacking (new question before old one closes)

share_drivers._the_only_metric_that_matters_for_growth: DM sends carry 3-5x weight of likes
_share_driver_options: Status signal — sharing this makes ME look good/smart/caring
Tribal identity — 'this is SO us' (city, profession, community)
Utility — practical value worth forwarding (deal, tip, hack)
Emotional intensity — strong feeling that demands sharing (tears, laughter, shock)
Moral/values — signals what I stand for

audience_model.primary_trigger: Fear | Greed | Status | Belonging | Aspiration | Relief
